title: Poster, 1991
inscribed:
Imprinted in black ink, lower right: Ambassador Arts. Maximum Impact. Minimum price.; 
upper left: First in a series of depression priced posters  Design: Paula Scher; upper right corner: For quality silkscreen printing - posters, packing comps, point-of-sale displays, bus shelter advertising, contest scratch off, presentations...and much more contact Ambassador Arts, Inc., 122 west 27th Street NYC. 10001  212 - 243 4290 8:00 am 12:00 midnight fax: 212-243-0407
description: In black text, a lower case 'a' on irregular areas of white. The letter is presented as if collaged together from separate pieces of paper held together with tape. In black, under the loop of the 'a': The big A.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1991.
1991. Screenprint on newsprint. Gift of Pentagram. 1998-42-1.
